revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2740R |revision=A1 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/01/2008 |fcc_id=KA2SL2740RA1 |pcb_id=8ASL265552A1G |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=TrendChip |cpu1_model=TC3162L2 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT2880F |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V54C3128164VB17 |ram2= |ram2_brand=ESMT |ram2_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880F |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=xDSL (ADSL2+) AFE;TrendChip;TC3086;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:26:5A |oui_eth=00:26:5A }} {{TagLine|Broadband Wireless N ADSL2+ Router}} :[http://www.dlink.com/uk/en/support/product/-/media/Consumer_Products/DSL/DSL%202740R/Manuals/dsl2740r_manual_v1_00_en_uk.pdf Manual]
"8ASL265552A1G" and "REV-A1" is silkscreened on the board. :The default SSID may be '''dlink'''.
===Models=== ;[[D-Link DSL-2740R rev A1]] *[https://www.dlink-forum.info/index.php?topic=96.0 ''D-Link DSL-2740R rev A1'' on '''D-Link''' forums] (IT) :CPU: [[TrendChip]] TC3162L2 :Flash: [[Spansion]] (2MB) :RAM: ''ProMOS/ESMT'' (16MB) :WLAN: [[Ralink]] RT2880F/RT2820 :SW/xDSL: [[IC+]] IP175E/[[TrendChip]] TC3086 ;[[D-Link DSL-2740R rev B1]] *[https://www.dlink-forum.info/index.php?topic=1150.0 ''D-Link DSL-2740R rev B1'' on '''D-Link''' forums] (IT) :CPU: [[TrendChip]] TC3162U :Flash: [[Winbond]] (4MB) :RAM: [[Winbond]] (16MB) :WLAN: [[Ralink]] RT5392 :SW/xDSL: [[TrendChip]] TC2205F/TC3086 ;[[D-Link DSL-2680 rev A1]] *[https://www.dlink-forum.info/index.php?topic=391.0 ''D-Link DSL-2680 rev A1'' on '''D-Link''' forums] (IT) :CPU: [[TrendChip]] TC3162U :Flash: [[Winbond]] W25Q16VSLG (2MB) :RAM: [[Winbond]] W9812G6JH-6 (16MB) :WLAN: [[Ralink]] RT3390L (1T1R) :SW/xDSL: [[TrendChip]] TC2206/TC3086
